labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

labels.name: wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

issues.title: Create authorization policy knobs for edit/delete of messages
issues.author: rohanmahy
issues.body: Make sure there are policy knobs that cover the scenarios discussed in MIMI content issues [#24](https://github.com/ietf-wg-mimi/draft-ietf-mimi-content/issues/24) and [#25](https://github.com/ietf-wg-mimi/draft-ietf-mimi-content/issues/25).

comments.author: rohanmahy
comments.body: Updates in draft-mahy-mimi-app-components have these capabilties. They will migrate into draft-ietf-mimi-room-policy in time for IETF122 (Bangkok)

issues.title: Role is defined multiple times
issues.author: timokoesters
issues.body:
If it is intended to define two roles, one name should be changed.
Or is the first role definition outdated? Then the draft should be rewritten to only use the second definition.

https://github.com/ietf-wg-mimi/mimi-room-policy/blob/36f8b7c5dc372862321c84b7c7e51997475e227a/draft-ietf-mimi-room-policy.md?plain=1#L204-L213

https://github.com/ietf-wg-mimi/mimi-room-policy/blob/36f8b7c5dc372862321c84b7c7e51997475e227a/draft-ietf-mimi-room-policy.md?plain=1#L368-L377
